<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Adding 'allow_public=true' attribute to table_name type columns of baseline config table</description>
        <name>Add allow_public to baseline config tble</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
gr.addQuery('name', 'baseline_config');
gr.addQuery('internal_type', 'table_name');
gr.query();
while (gr.next()) {
    var attributes = gr.getValue('attributes');
    attributes += ',allow_public=true';
    gr.setValue('attributes', attributes);
    gr.update();
}]]></script>
